name.ja: <ruby>道化の一座<rt>クラウン・クラン</rt></ruby> メテオ

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when your monster is Tribute Summoned. If this card is Tributed: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each of these effects of "Clown Clan Meteor" once per turn);
● Shuffle all Synchro Monsters on the field and in the GYs into the Deck.
● Target 1 "Clown Clan" card in your GY, except "Clown Clan Meteor"; add it to your hand.
